user_auth.models module¶

user_auth.urls module¶

user_auth.views module¶

user_auth.views.authenticate_user(request)[source]¶

This will either render the login page, or will send the user to the index page.

It will decide which after checking if the user is logged in and a valid user.

user_auth.views.create_user(request)[source]¶

This will render the create_user.html (the user register) page.

user_auth.views.reg_user(request)[source]¶

This will either render the create_user.html (the user register) page, or will send the user to the index page.

It will create a User object based on what the user input on the page.

After checking if the User object is valid it will send the user back to the index page, otherwise it will send the user back to the register page.

user_auth.views.show_user(request)[source]¶

This is a testing page used to see the users name and encrypted password.

user_auth.views.user_login(request)[source]¶

This renders the login.html page.
